name: callStackDump
description: Similar to the function callStackGet except that it returns a string representation of the call stack.

params.name: destination
params.description: Parameter that takes either console, browser, or file.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: In this example, the factorial of a number is computed. The example is similar to the example for CallStackGet except that the function used here is callStackDump.callfact.cfm

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.code:
<cffunction name='factorial' hint='returns the factorial of a number' output='true'> 
 <cfargument name='n' required='yes' type='numeric' hint='The number for which the factorial is returned'/> 
 <cfif n eq 1> 
 <Cfset callStackDump()> 
 <cfreturn 1> 
 <cfelse> 
 <Cfset callStackDump()> 
 <cfreturn n * factorial(n - 1)> 
 </cfif> 
 </cffunction> 
 <cfoutput> Factorial of 5 - #factorial(5)#</cfoutput>
